programme.title: My First Summer
programme.desc: Isolated on a remote property after her mother's death, 16-year-old Claudia finds her world transformed when spirited teenager Grace appears. Drama, starring Markella Kavenagh and Maiah Stewardson.(n)

programme.title: Spotlight
programme.desc: A team of investigative reporters for a Boston newspaper look into claims of children being molested within the Catholic church. The journalists discover the situation is far worse than it seemed, as they find a conspiracy among the city's legal, religious and government establishments to cover up decades of abuse. Oscar-winning fact-based drama, starring Mark Ruffalo, Michael Keaton, Rachel McAdams and Stanley Tucci.(n)

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Five teenagers who occupy different areas of their school's social structure are thrown together for a Saturday morning detention. During the day, they analyse their behaviour and find unexpected common ground. Drama, directed by John Hughes and starring Emilio Estevez, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald, Anthony Michael Hall, Ally Sheedy and Paul Gleason.(n)

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: The story of Frank Abagnale Jr, who found notoriety as a teenager conning and charming his way across America. Posing as a pilot, a doctor and a lawyer, Frank was able to fund an extravagant lifestyle while outwitting the FBI at every turn. Fact-based drama, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken, Martin Sheen and James Brolin.(n)

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.(n)

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: An alcoholic former professional player reluctantly agrees to train an all-female baseball team during the Second World War. With star player Dottie Hinson and her sister Kit on board, they look set to dominate the league - until sibling rivalry rears its head. Comedy drama, starring Geena Davis, Lori Petty, Tom Hanks and Madonna.(n)

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: Golden Globe-winning comic drama, written and directed by Greta Gerwig. Artistic California teenager Lady Bird expects much from life. However, the strained relationship with her mother and failing family finances keep clipping her wings, while early romance leads to heartache. Saoirse Ronan, Laurie Metcalf and Tracy Letts star.(n)

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: A slow-witted man has a series of bizarre adventures, including becoming an American football star, Vietnam veteran, table tennis champion and millionaire businessman - but the love of his life from childhood continues to elude him. Robert Zemeckis's Oscar-winning comedy drama, starring Tom Hanks, Sally Field, Robin Wright and Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: Parachute
programme.desc: Riley, a young woman recently released from rehab, meets Ethan and finds herself navigating the line between love and a new addiction. Director Brittany Snow's romantic comedy drama, starring Courtney Eaton, Thomas Mann and Dave Bautista.(n)

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Five teenagers who occupy different areas of their school's social structure are thrown together for a Saturday morning detention. During the day, they analyse their behaviour and find unexpected common ground. Drama, directed by John Hughes and starring Emilio Estevez, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald, Anthony Michael Hall, Ally Sheedy and Paul Gleason.(n)

programme.title: My First Summer
programme.desc: Isolated on a remote property after her mother's death, 16-year-old Claudia finds her world transformed when spirited teenager Grace appears. Drama, starring Markella Kavenagh and Maiah Stewardson.(n)

programme.title: I Used to Be Funny
programme.desc: A stand-up comedian struggling with PTSD agonises over whether or not to join the search for a missing teenage girl she used to look after. Writer-director Ally Pankiw's comedy drama, starring Rachel Sennott and Olga Petsa.(n)

programme.title: L'immensità
programme.desc: In 1970s Rome, a mother contends with her loveless and abusive marriage while caring for her children, one of who is experiencing gender dysphoria and wishes to identify as a boy. Family drama, starring Penélope Cruz, Vincenzo Amato and Luana Giuliani. In Italian.(n)

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: An alcoholic former professional player reluctantly agrees to train an all-female baseball team during the Second World War. With star player Dottie Hinson and her sister Kit on board, they look set to dominate the league - until sibling rivalry rears its head. Comedy drama, starring Geena Davis, Lori Petty, Tom Hanks and Madonna.(n)

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: Wallace is a medical school drop-out who has given up on love after a series of bad break-ups, while Chantry is an animator who lives with her boyfriend. The two become friends since neither is interested in a relationship with the other - but as they grow closer, they begin to wonder if they belong together. Romantic drama, starring Daniel Radcliffe and Zoe Kazan.(n)

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: A slow-witted man has a series of bizarre adventures, including becoming an American football star, Vietnam veteran, table tennis champion and millionaire businessman - but the love of his life from childhood continues to elude him. Robert Zemeckis's Oscar-winning comedy drama, starring Tom Hanks, Sally Field, Robin Wright and Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: Golden Globe-winning comic drama, written and directed by Greta Gerwig. Artistic California teenager Lady Bird expects much from life. However, the strained relationship with her mother and failing family finances keep clipping her wings, while early romance leads to heartache. Saoirse Ronan, Laurie Metcalf and Tracy Letts star.(n)

programme.title: North Hollywood
programme.desc: A youngster must decide between choosing the future his father wants and following his dream of becoming a pro skateboarder. Confronted with the uncertainty of his future - and how it might impact his friends and family - he takes steps to build relationships with professional skaters in an effort to forge his own path. Comedy drama, starring Ryder McLaughlin, Vince Vaughn and Miranda Cosgrove.(n)

programme.title: Save the Cinema
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of Liz Evans from Carmarthen, south-west Wales, who started a campaign in the 1990s to save the town's Lyric Cinema. With the help of local politician Richard Goodridge, Liz manages to persuade Steven Spielberg to show a premiere of Jurassic Park at the Lyric. Starring Samantha Morton, Tom Felton and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: Valentine's Day
programme.desc: Anthology of stories charting the romantic complications of various Los Angeles residents. A businessman and a soldier on leave share a flight home, a teacher is smitten with a doctor and an elderly couple comfort their lovesick grandson. Romantic comedy drama, with Ashton Kutcher, Jessica Alba, Jamie Foxx, Jennifer Garner and Julia Roberts.(n)

programme.desc: Teenager Patricia 'Trish' Weir is committed to putting her kidnapper and rapist Ernesto Miranda in prison, while her life is wrecked by the legal system. Drama, starring Abigail Breslin, Emily VanCamp and Kyle MacLachlan.

programme.title: Speak Like a Child
programme.desc: A couple are reunited with a man they grew up with in a children's home years earlier - but the apparently happy reunion soon dredges up dark secrets from their past, and it's not long before tensions bubble to the surface. Drama, starring Cal Macaninch, Daniel Newman, Richard Mylan and Rachel Fielding.

programme.title: West North West
programme.desc: A romance develops between a Japanese bartender, an Iranian art student and a Japanese model. Drama, starring Hanae Kan and Sahel Rosa.

programme.title: Bonus Track
programme.desc: An aspiring teenage musician teams up with the son of a rock star to try and win the school talent show. Comedy, starring Joe Anders, Samuel Small and Susan Wokoma.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: American fashion model-turned-war photographer Lee Miller is determined to document the truth of the Nazi regime, and in spite of the odds stacked against female correspondents, she captures some of the most important images of the Second World War. Fact-based drama, starring Kate Winslet, Andy Samberg, Alexander Skarsgard and Marion Cotillard.

programme.title: Miranda's Victim
programme.desc: Teenager Patricia 'Trish' Weir is committed to putting her kidnapper and rapist Ernesto Miranda in prison, while her life is wrecked by the legal system. Drama, starring Abigail Breslin, Emily VanCamp and Kyle MacLachlan.

programme.title: West North West
programme.desc: A romance develops between a Japanese bartender, an Iranian art student and a Japanese model. Drama, starring Hanae Kan and Sahel Rosa.

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A teenager in 1960s London is unhappy with his lot in life, but believes he has found a place to belong in the mod subculture and their feud with the rival rockers. But bit by bit, his naive vision of the world is cruelly shattered. Drama based on the Who album, starring Phil Daniels, Leslie Ash, Sting and Ray Winstone.

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capote's novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam.

programme.title: The Integrity Of Joseph Chambers
programme.desc: An insurance salesman, hoping to prove his survivalist skills to his family, irresponsibly goes hunting alone. But he isn't prepared for what lies ahead. Writer/director Robert Machoian's drama, starring Clayne Crawford and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: The China Syndrome
programme.desc: A nuclear power plant controller discovers a potentially disastrous operational flaw but refuses to report it. A visiting TV journalist and cameraman pick up on the story - but as they struggle to get the news on air, a quick-witted engineer realises the danger is far more pronounced than anyone suspects. Thriller, starring Jane Fonda, Michael Douglas, Jack Lemmon and Scott Brady.

programme.title: Bonus Track
programme.desc: An aspiring teenage musician teams up with the son of a rock star to try and win the school talent show. Comedy, starring Joe Anders, Samuel Small and Susan Wokoma.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: American fashion model-turned-war photographer Lee Miller is determined to document the truth of the Nazi regime, and in spite of the odds stacked against female correspondents, she captures some of the most important images of the Second World War. Fact-based drama, starring Kate Winslet, Andy Samberg, Alexander Skarsgard and Marion Cotillard.

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capote's novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Director Michael Mann's drama, starring Adam Driver and Jack O'Connell.

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Unfortunately, he hasn't secured a place on the official British Royal Legion trip to France to the commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. Drama, starring Michael Caine and Glenda Jackson in her final film.

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: The China Syndrome
programme.desc: A nuclear power plant controller discovers a potentially disastrous operational flaw but refuses to report it. A visiting TV journalist and cameraman pick up on the story - but as they struggle to get the news on air, a quick-witted engineer realises the danger is far more pronounced than anyone suspects. Thriller, starring Jane Fonda, Michael Douglas, Jack Lemmon and Scott Brady.

programme.title: The Integrity Of Joseph Chambers
programme.desc: An insurance salesman, hoping to prove his survivalist skills to his family, irresponsibly goes hunting alone. But he isn't prepared for what lies ahead. Writer/director Robert Machoian's drama, starring Clayne Crawford and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: A teenager strives to be a good daughter, a good friend and a good student - all while navigating an endless barrage of invasive, obsessive thoughts that she cannot control. When she reconnects with her childhood crush, she is confronted with fundamental questions about her potential for love, happiness, friendship and hope - all while trying to solve a mystery surrounding a fugitive billionaire. Romantic drama, starring Isabela Merced, Cree and Judy Reyes.

programme.title: The Man with the Answers
programme.desc: A former diving champion and an eccentric student take an adventurous road trip of rediscovery. Romantic drama, starring Vasilis Magouliotis, Anton Weil and Stella Fyrogeni. In Greek, Italian, German and English.(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's biopic of the technology entrepreneur, exploring his life through three pivotal moments over the course of 14 years. Jobs is passionately driven to revolutionise computing technology, but his dreams come at a price, with a devastating impact on both is relationship with his family and his own health. Starring Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet and Seth Rogen.(n)

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. Clarice is a vivacious young factory worker in the industrial British midlands of the 1920s. Bursting with ideas for colours and shapes, she takes more and more dangerous risks, but manages to stay one step ahead of the workhouse and impress eccentric factory owner Colley Shorter with her talent and innovation. Starring Phoebe Dynevor, Matthew Goode and David Morrissey.(n)

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: Following the assassination of her husband, President John F Kennedy, Jacqueline Kennedy battles with grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define JFK's legacy. Director Pablo Larrain's Bafta-winning drama, starring Natalie Portman, Peter Sarsgaard and Greta Gerwig. Mica Levi provided the Oscar-nominated score.(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: The spirit of murdered executive Sam Wheat tries to find a way to help his girlfriend Molly Jensen bring killer Carl Bruner to justice, and enlists the aid of fraudulent medium Oda Mae Brown - who is amazed and baffled when her supposed psychic powers turn out to be all too real. Romantic fantasy, starring Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore, Tony Goldwyn and a Whoopi Goldberg, who won the Best Supporting Actress Oscar for her role as Brown.(n)

programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: A teenager strives to be a good daughter, a good friend and a good student - all while navigating an endless barrage of invasive, obsessive thoughts that she cannot control. programme.title: The Damned United
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling Brian Clough's ill-fated 44-day tenure as boss of Leeds United in 1974, after Don Revie's departure for the job of England's manager. Following his acrimonious split from Derby County and a brief spell at Brighton \u0026 Hove Albion, Clough arrived at Elland Road on a wave of controversy, after previously being an outspoken critic of the club, and struggled to find allies among the playing staff. With Michael Sheen, Timothy Spall, Jim Broadbent and Colm Meaney.(n)

programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A Florida woman decides to solve time travel in order to go back and be the person she always intended. Sci-fi drama, starring Mary-Louise Parker and Ayo Edebiri.(n)

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Mildred, an 11-year-old girl, finds her world turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, takes her on a wild adventure. Family comedy, starring Elijah Wood and Nell Fisher.(n)

programme.title: Rebellious
programme.desc: A princess is kidnapped by an evil sorcerer and her scholarly fiance must use his wits in an epic quest to find her, while she boldly challenges her captors and plots a daring escape. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Vanessa Johansson and Marc Thompson.(n)

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Environmental activists hijack an energy company's gala in Canary Wharf and take 300 hostages and an ex-soldier now working as a window cleaner tries to rescue them. Action thriller, starring Daisy Ridley. Action thriller, starring Daisy Ridley and Clive Owen.(n)

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: A family tragedy woos Delia Deetz, daughter Lydia and rebellious teenage granddaughter Astrid back to the close-knit community of Winter River. Astrid accidentally opens a portal to the afterlife by summoning Beetlejuice three times. The mischievous demon ricochets between realms, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Tim Burton's comedy sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega.(n)

programme.desc: Mildred, an 11-year-old girl, finds her world turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, takes her on a wild adventure. Family comedy, starring Elijah Wood and Nell Fisher.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Following a shipwreck, a robot called Roz survives on an uninhabited island with the help of wild animals. Family animation, with the voices of Lupita Nyong'o, Pedro Pascal, Kit Connor and Bill Nighy.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: A family tragedy woos Delia Deetz, daughter Lydia and rebellious teenage granddaughter Astrid back to the close-knit community of Winter River. Astrid accidentally opens a portal to the afterlife by summoning Beetlejuice three times. The mischievous demon ricochets between realms, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Tim Burton's comedy sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: On holiday in Europe, American couple Ben and Louise Dalton and their anxiety-crippled daughter Agnes meet English doctor Patrick Feld, his wife Ciara and their young son Ant, who was born without a tongue. The Daltons' vacation soon turns into a nightmare when they are invited to stay on the Felds' country estate. Horror, starring James McAvoy, Mackenzie Davis, Scoot McNairy and Aisling Franciosi.

programme.desc: A 19th-century widow must make an unimaginable choice when, during a cruel winter, a foreign ship sinks off the coast of her fishing village. Horror mystery, starring Odessa Young, Joe Cole, Siobhan Finneran and Rory McCann.

programme.title: A Mistake
programme.desc: A talented surgeon's life unravels after an inexperienced colleague makes a fatal mistake. Medical drama, starring Elizabeth Banks, Simon McBurney and Joel Tolbeck.

programme.title: The Karate Kid

programme.desc: High-kicking karate student Daniel and his mentor Mr Miyagi travel to Japan to settle an old score. Family action sequel with Pat Morita and Ralph Macchio.

programme.desc: Hothead Daniel dumps Mr Miyagi for a new coach. But without his ally, can the youngster defeat the toxic waste baron who is training an old enemy? Mild violence.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. Action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Jeremy Iro

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Josh Hartnett and Charithra Chandran. Ex-CIA agent Lucas Reyes is tasked with boarding an international flight in order to identify and apprehend a mysterious hacker. However, the job grows infinitely more complicated when Reyes realises the plane is stuffed with assassins all battling to take down his target - and kill him in the process.

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Aboard the International Space Station, tensions flare between the US and Russian astronauts after a nuclear war breaks out on Earth. Sci-fi space thriller, starring Ariana DeBose, Chris Messina and John Gallagher Jr.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Lao Luo is a washed-up stuntman with a deformed horse called Red Hare, who he saved from euthanasia. The duo become overnight sensations when a fight with debt collectors goes viral. Writer/director Larry Yang's action drama, starring Jackie Chan, Liu Haocun and Kevin Guo. In Mandarin, with subtitles.

programme.title: Force of Nature: The Dry 2
programme.desc: Five women participate in a hiking retreat, but only four come out the other side. Federal agents Aaron Falk and Carmen Cooper head into the mountains hoping to find their informant still alive. Thriller, starring Eric Bana, Anna Torv and Deborra-Lee Furness.

programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: Biblical comedy starring LaKeith Stanfield. In AD 33 Jerusalem, debt-ridden criminal Clarence, the ne'er-do-well atheist brother of apostle Thomas, decides to make some much-needed cash by posing as a new messiah. But learning the same "tricks" as Jesus Christ proves tougher than initially assumed.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: While visiting an island for her husband's work, a woman meets a stranger who takes over her life. Thriller, starring Ashley Greene, Brooke Lyons and Tom Felton. Directed by Joel David Moore, better known as one of the stars of the Avatar films.

programme.title: The Radleys
programme.desc: Horror comedy starring Kelly Macdonald and Damian Lewis. Although they blend in with suburban middle-class society, Helen and Peter Radley are secretly abstinent vampires. But when their children suddenly become aware of this "family disease", the parents are forced to seek support from Peter's free-spirited twin, Will, who begins to rouse the family's feral urges.

programme.title: Mean Girls

Musical adaptation of the 2004 cult classic, starring Angourie Rice, Renee Rapp, Auli'i Cravalho, a

programme.title: The Beekeeper

Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. Action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Jeremy Iro

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: Comedy thriller starring Will Smith and Martin Lawrence. When a figure from the past returns and targets detective Mike Lowery for assassination, he and partner Marcus Burnett are forced to fight back - curtailing Burnett's retirement plans. But things aren't all they seem, and it gradually becomes clear that Lowery may have an even deeper connection with their assailant.
